snippet: Meet the 12 horses who have come oh-so-close since 1978, winning the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness but failing in the Belmont Stakes.
abstract: Twelve horses have fallen just short of the Triple Crown, winning the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness but faltering at the Belmont Stakes, since 1978; profiles of each of the 12 charted; it remains to be seen whether California Chrome will take the crown or become the 13th horse of the list.
lead_paragraph: Meet the 12 horses who have come oh-so-close since 1978, winning the Kentucky Derby and the Preakness but failing in the Belmont Stakes.

headline.main: 12 Contenders Who Just Missed Out on a Triple Crown
